name: Table
description: Semantic data table with configurable styling, sizing, and optional sticky headers

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=grid for interactive tables. Caption provides accessible table description. Column and row headers use appropriate th elements. Screen readers can navigate cell by cell.
knownLimitations: Complex tables with merged cells may require additional ARIA annotations

recommendedUsage: Use for displaying structured tabular data. Provide meaningful caption for context. Use striped variant for better row scanning. Enable sticky header for long tables.
antiPatterns: Do not use for layout purposes. Avoid hiding important columns on mobile without alternative views. For complex interactive features, use DataTable instead.
